name: Robot Heroes (itch)
description:
Welcome to the Arch, fellow cybernan...

Duke it out in this mysterious world of robots, and use their unique abilities to win the fight.

FEATURES:
  • a Versus Mode to easily pick up the game and duke it out with your friends
  • an (unfinished) Arcade Mode to discover the different characters
  • a cast of robots with each with their own story and personality
  • a distinctive and colourful, yet gritty aesthetic
  • a handful of bugs features
  • fun!

    May also include in the future :

  • a Story Mode to fight the Glitch invasion and uncover the mysteries of the land of the Arch!
  • More characters !
HOW TO PLAY ( "Option>Keyboard" to change keys) :

Move around with WASD or the arrow keys.

Use JKL to release light, medium or heavy attacks, that can be spiced up by inputting a direction at the same time !

Use U, along with a direction, to cast powerful magic attacks, at the cost of some gauge. If you have enough, you can even release your Super by pressing U alone.

Finally, press I to use your character's specific movement options, and O to break the guard of your opponent.

What about controllers and online?

To use your controllers, you can always use a software like AntiMicro to map controller buttons to keys.

As for online play, I would recommend something such as Parsec.
These two are the ones that worked for me, but if you have an alternative feel free to tell me, so that I can add it on this page for others to see!

Can i do fanart of your stuff?

I would be more than pleased to see that (or hear that if its a remix of some sort). Seeing people interact with my game and this universe truly means the world !

My only demand is attribution. Don't pass my characters or any of my game's content as your own original content, and redirect people to the game page or my various socials !

Have fun with Robot Heroes !
